name: Risky Rider - Free Online Bike Game
name_original: Risky Rider - Free Online Bike Game
description:
Perform dangerous stunts and crazy moves with the best Risky Rider!

Choose your bike, upgrade the speed, weight and suspension and then jump and race over tall obstacles, soar through deadly fire hoops and thrill the crowd with cool flips and tricks! Many awesome levels of racing fun! Don't forget to upgrade your BMX Motocross! The levels are challenging, but not impossible! Can you become the champion?

Download and play for free now!
